member.name: T:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.AuthenticationResponse
member.summary: Response returned after a successful authentication.

member.name: P:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.AuthenticationResponse.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the authenticated user.

member.name: P:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.AuthenticationResponse.FirstName
member.summary: Gets the first name of the authenticated user.

member.name: P:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.AuthenticationResponse.LastName
member.summary: Gets the last name of the authenticated user.

member.name: P:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.AuthenticationResponse.Email
member.summary: Gets the email of the authenticated user.

member.name: P:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.AuthenticationResponse.Token
member.summary: Gets the JWT token issued upon successful authentication.

member.name: P:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.RegisterRequest.FirstName
member.summary: Gets the first name of the user.

member.name: P:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.RegisterRequest.LastName
member.summary: Gets the last name of the user.

member.name: P:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.RegisterRequest.Email
member.summary: Gets the email address of the user.

member.name: P:BuberDinner.Api.Authentication.RegisterRequest.Password
member.summary: Gets the password of the user.
